tool_description: Knowledge base API that lends you an edge while traveling in Vietnam.
name: Vietnam Trivial By Insider
title: Vietnam Trivial By Insider

api_list.name: Vietnam statistics
api_list.description: Full statistics about the country Vietnam
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vietnam-trivial-by-insider.p.rapidapi.com/vietnam_statistics"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vietnam-trivial-by-insider.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Vietnam fun facts for travellers
api_list.description: API contains facts and trivial from a native born Vietnamese who often surprised at funny mistakes travelers made while visiting Vietnam.  Enjoy!
